definition: a manly man/a man of character
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m)/to measure/husband/polite appellation for an older male
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
husband/man/manual worker/conscripted laborer (old)
(coll.) he-man
pinyin: nan2 zi3 han4 da4 zhang4 fu5

definition: A leader can submit or can stand tall as required./ready to give and take/flexible
pinyin: da4 zhang4 fu5 neng2 qu1 neng2 shen1

sentences.english: You speak like a man of spirit .
sentences.chinese: 你说的话真象个大丈夫。

sentences.english: A great man should live in this world with an indomitable spirit.
sentences.chinese: 大丈夫活在世上要顶天立地。

sentences.english: Big boys don't cry, except if you are President of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 大丈夫是不哭的，除非你是美国总统。

sentences.english: I believethefirst test of truly great man is his humility.
sentences.chinese: 我认为认准一个大丈夫的首要测试就是他的谦逊。

sentences.english: Fifth, Gray Wolf gentleman there is man's wife spirit.
sentences.chinese: 第五，灰太狼有男子汉大丈夫的爱妻精神。

sentences.english: "Come," said he to himself, "be a man.
sentences.chinese: “嗨，”他对自己说，“我是一个男子汉大丈夫。

sentences.english: Like men we'll face the murderous, cowardly pack.
sentences.chinese: 大丈夫直面卑怯的凶手。

sentences.english: What kind of man makes it through Hell Week?That's hard to say.
sentences.chinese: 什么样的大丈夫能通过魔鬼训练周呢？

sentences.english: Then manfully despising The Turkish tyrant's yoke.
sentences.chinese: 做一个大丈夫，鄙视那土耳其暴君的枷锁。

definition: (coll.) he-man
pinyin: nan2 zi3 han4 da4 zhang4 fu5

definition: a (real) man/boy/son
man (i.e. manly, masculine)
can bow and submit, or can stand tall (idiom, from Book of Changes); ready to give and take/flexible
not corrupted by wealth and honors
to have a clear conscience
(literary) we/us
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
(archaic) we/us/(Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
lofty quality/mettle/spirit
lit. heroism reaching to the clouds (idiom)
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
loyal and righteous/fealty/loyalty
high aims
big and stout/big-hearted/open and honest/continuous/repeated
to sweep away evil/to purge (the world of crime)
